title: Emerald-Kissed Diamond Jhumka – A Timeless South Indian Treasure
materials: meticulously handcrafted. Features a vibrant pear-shaped Emerald (కుదనపు పచ్చ) of exceptional clarity
surrounded by meticulously set sparkling Diamonds. Genuine Pearls adorn the bottom. Enhanced with a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: Classic Jhumka design with intricate filigree work inspired by traditional South Indian architecture. The emerald centerpiece is set in a delicate floral pattern. The cascading pearls enhance the jhumka’s graceful movement and traditional charm. Features open setting for maximum brilliance of diamonds.
colors: complemented by the vibrant Green of the Emerald and the soft luster of the Pearls. A color palette that resonates with Telugu traditions.
occasions: and festive celebrations like Diwali and Ugadi. Also suitable for special occasions where you want to showcase your heritage and style.
description: These Jhumkas are a harmonious blend of tradition and elegance. The combination of emeralds, diamonds, and pearls signifies prosperity and good fortune. The intricate gold work, handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensures a unique and timeless piece. The excellent craftsmanship makes it a durable and treasured family heirloom.
